Write-Up Text: People on social media platforms have been sharing their thoughts and concerns about Australia's upcoming Federal Budget release. While one user expresses support for increased budgetary support for disadvantaged Australians others call for greater government accountability and prioritization of essentials over corporate interests. The pharmaceutical benefits scheme and regional electric vehicle infrastructure are hot topics. Women in economics' representation in policy spheres is highlighted while concerns on the effects of doubling the amount of medicines for Australians are raised.
